title: Bikepacking the Valley of the Giants in Oregonâ€™s new Odyssey of the VOG event
content:
While we’re still unsure of how & when mass participation events will responsibly rebound this year on a larger scale, the new self-supported Odyssey of the VOG bikepacking event could be something to consider in the interim. A grassroots-organized trip along Oregon’s beautiful and rugged Pacific coast the Odyssey of the Valley of the Giants, […]

The post Bikepacking the Valley of the Giants in Oregon’s new Odyssey of the VOG event appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
